Name: Fugitive Criminal
About the game: Fugitive Criminal is a stealth maze puzzle with finding keys and doors with a top view. The player needs to manage an escaped prisoner, trying not to get caught by the guards. Otherwise, they will open fire and chase the player. The player has several advantages: he runs faster than fat guards, can hide in the shadows and turn off the light, which would disorient their enemies and while they go to turn on the light, the player can slip past them unnoticed. Locations are mazes with doors, some of which are locked and to go further you will have to find the keys that are hidden in the lockers. Complete 20 confusing levels to break free, good luck!
